revised_title: Thomas Howell Laby: A Pioneering Australian Scientist
tldr: Thomas Howell Laby was an Australian scientist who overcame challenging early life circumstances to become a distinguished chemist and researcher. He made significant contributions to the field of radioactivity, discovering radium in Australian minerals and conducting important research at the University of Sydney. Despite not having a traditional academic background, Laby's exceptional originality and independence led him to achieve remarkable success in his scientific career.
